channel.title: Comments on: Lynx on Mac OS X

item.title: By: Chuck
item.dc:creator: Chuck
item.description: Lynxlet (http://habilis.net/lynxlet/) is another port of Lynx, designed to be quick and easy to use. A wrapper application encapsulates Lynx, and it has a Bookmarklet/Favelet for quick launching from other browsers.
item.content:encoded: Lynxlet (http://habilis.net/lynxlet/) is another port of Lynx, designed to be quick and easy to use. A wrapper application encapsulates Lynx, and it has a Bookmarklet/Favelet for quick launching from other browsers.

item.title: By: Lloyd Budd
item.dc:creator: Lloyd Budd
item.description: http://finkproject.org/ is what I used to manage additional open source tools when a Mac was my main computer.
item.content:encoded: http://finkproject.org/ is what I used to manage additional open source tools when a Mac was my main computer.

item.title: By: Jake
item.dc:creator: Jake
item.description: I'm laughing at the fact of how simple of a text browser Lynx is. There are so many great text browsers being developed nowadays. I prefer Elinks, which supports color, frames, tables, and basic CSS.
item.content:encoded: I’m laughing at the fact of how simple of a text browser Lynx is. There are so many great text browsers being developed nowadays. I prefer Elinks, which supports color, frames, tables, and basic CSS.
